mapper.select: select * from tb_schedule where stat_date=#{statDate} or end_date=#{endDate}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_schedule( sch_no, user_no, start_date, end_date, sch_detail, sch_color ) values( s_schedule.nevtval(), #{userNo}, #{startDate}, #{schDetail}, #{schColor} );
